sentences.en: "Very well," I said, adopting a crisp authoritative tone.
sentences.cn: “很好，”我用干脆的命令性的语气说道。

sentences.en: Amanda launched into an authoritative disquisition about contracts.
sentences.cn: 阿曼达就合约给出了权威性的阐述。

sentences.en: David speaks in an authoritative tone.
sentences.cn: 大卫以命令的口吻说话.

sentences.en: Don't be so authoritative when you ask me to do something.
sentences.cn: 你要我做事时,不要那么专横.

sentences.en: From him the church acquired the disposition to be authoritative and unquestioned.
sentences.cn: 教会从他那里得到了独尊而不许人过问的倾向.

sentences.en: He spoke rapidly and in an authoritative manner.
sentences.cn: 他讲得很快,而且用的是命令式的口气.

sentences.en: Her smile was warm but authoritative.
sentences.cn: 她的笑容很和蔼，同时又透着威严。

sentences.en: Her voice was crisp and authoritative.
sentences.cn: 她的声音干脆利落,具有权威性.

sentences.en: Is this an authoritative order or a personal request?
sentences.cn: 这是官方的命令还是个人的要求?

sentences.en: So far no authoritative figures are available as to the persent telephone ownership in this city.
sentences.cn: 迄今为止,此城市电话的拥有数量尚无官方统计数字.

sentences.en: The Bi Metallic doctrine is certainly authoritative in situations that can be unambiguously characterized as rulemaking.
sentences.cn: "双金属"案的理论在可明确形容为规则制定的情形下显然是有权威性的.

sentences.en: The evidence she uses is usually highly authoritative.
sentences.cn: 她采用的证据通常都具有很高的可信度。

sentences.en: the most authoritative work on English surnames
sentences.cn: 有关英语姓氏的最权威著作

sentences.en: They yield authoritative statements on rules of law.
sentences.cn: 它们对法律规则作了权威性陈述.
这是一本具有权威性的传记.
